name: Special BG Drawing Object
description: A special background drawing object with different activation and appearance conditions.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The variable that activates this special background object.

fields.name: Unknown Flags 1
fields.description: Flags that define unknown behaviors for this background object.

fields.name: Unknown Flag 2
fields.description: An additional flag for an unknown state or condition.

fields.name: Background Type
fields.description: Defines which background drawing object is used for the scene.

0.name: Hyrule Castle Gate
0.description: The background is the Hyrule Castle gate.

1.name: Hyrule Castle Door
1.description: The background is the Hyrule Castle door.

2.name: Hyrule Castle Windows
